briefTitle: Randomized Trial in Adult Participants With Acute Migraines
officialTitle: Double-Blind, Randomized, Placebo-controlled, Safety and Efficacy Trial of BHV-3500 (Zavegepant) Intranasal for the Acute Treatment of Migraine
summary: The purpose of this study is to test the safety and efficacy of BHV-3500 (zavegepant) versus placebo in the acute treatment of moderate or severe migraine.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Freedom From Pain at 2 Hours Post-dose
